summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1516, for the improvement of North and West 60th Street, from Phinney Avenue to west boundary line of the City of Seattle by grading and curbing the same under Ordinance No. 16206 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
